sqlQuery.name: HouseholdsByCharacteristics_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select dwpct.name as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as ave_anoph, dwpct.part_count from ( select da.pan_id,da.name,count(*) as part_count from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da where io.output_pan_id in ($$participants_prism$$) and da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id group by da.pan_id,da.name ) dwpct, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where dwpct.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and la.OBI_0001619 >= $$date_range.min$$ and la.OBI_0001619 <= $$date_range.max$$ group by dwpct.name,dwpct.part_count
